name: Not the Froggiest
description:
Be the last frog standing in this competition for tiny islands crumbling into the water.
Playable solo or in local multiplayer.

How to play :

Jumping from an island will damage it, until nothing is left of it. If you land on an occupied island, you will also damage it, and keep bouncing in the direction of your latest jump. Make your opponents fall into the water before you do.

Press P to open the menu.

Credit where it's due :

Homelike font by Daddi Daryawan

Made in 4 days for Weekly Game Jam 149 - Theme : "Last One Left"
